title: Animal Locomotion Plate 14
description: Walking, right hand at chin.  From a portfolio of 83 collotypes, 1887, by Eadweard Muybridge; part of 781 plates published under the auspices of the University of Pennsylvania
creditline: Gift of Samuel C. Gale, William H. Hinkle, Albert Loring, Charles M. Loring, Charles J. Martin, and Charles Alfred Pillsbury
